content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: black_stained_glass
inventory=[{"type": "sand", "quantity": 8, "index": 12}, {"type": "ink_sac", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "lava_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "cooked_beef", "quantity": 15, "index": 29}, {"type": "light_blue_concrete", "quantity": 46, "index": 30}, {"type": "rabbit_spawn_egg", "quantity": 29, "index": 41}]

thought: To craft black stained glass, I need to place 8 glass blocks in a square around a black dye block in the center. Since I have 8 sand blocks, I will first smelt them into glass blocks. However, I do not have any fuel to smelt with. Therefore, I will first move the ink sac into the crafting grid so that I can craft black dye.
Ok
act: move from slot 18 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: black_stained_glass

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

Ok
act: smelt from slot 12 to slot 13 with quantity 1
